participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and imaginative, loves adventure and storytelling.
participant_1.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i'm in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: sociable and cheerful, enjoys music and social events.
participant_2.background: my favorite singer is taylor swift. i am 24 years old. i'm getting married in the spring. i love eating out with friends.
